name: EarthApple
description:
Made for the GitHub Game-Off 2021. Browser version seems to lag quite a lot on Firefox!

Earthapple

Red thing in tree... Must be tasty. Go get it!

(You play as a ladybug who must traverse a tree to retrieve an apple)

Controls

MOVE - Arrows left/right | OR | a/d
JUMP - Z-key | OR | N-key
GRAB - X-key | OR | M-key

Also works with controller. On XBOX: Joystick to move; A to jump; X to grab. Have not tried with different controllers.

Credits

Made with Lexaloffe's Pico-8: https://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php

Everything else by me: upperC.
